mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (name, team_id, owner, progress, start_date, end_date, updated_by) VALUES (#{name}, #{team.id}, #{owner}, #{progress}, #{start}, #{end}, #{updatedBy})
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id AS project_id, p.name AS project_name, p.owner, p.progress, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.updated_by, p.updated_at,
t.id AS team_id, t.name AS team_name,
COALESCE( array_agg(u.username) FILTER(WHERE u.username IS NOT NULL), '{}' ) AS managers
FROM project p JOIN team t ON t.id = p.team_id LEFT JOIN project_manager pm ON pm.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN "user" u ON u.id = pm.user_id
WHERE p.id = #{id}

SELECT p.id AS project_id, p.name AS project_name, p.owner, p.progress, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.updated_by, p.updated_at,
t.id AS team_id, t.name AS team_name,
COALESCE( array_agg(u.username) FILTER(WHERE u.username IS NOT NULL), '{}' ) AS managers
FROM project p JOIN team t ON t.id = p.team_id LEFT JOIN project_manager pm ON pm.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN "user" u ON u.id = pm.user_id
WHERE p.team_id = #{teamId}
GROUP BY p.id, t.id
ORDER BY p.updated_at DESC
